headline: Why Roper Technologies (ROP) is the Best Stock to Buy for the Long-Term According to Charles Akre?
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Best Stocks to Buy for the Long-Term According to Charles Akre. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Roper Technologies, Inc.
